duties_responsibilities.duty: Function as a first scrub/scrub assistant in selected cases to render quality service to patients of all ages and surgeons during operative procedures.
Assist with the preparation of sterile/unsterile supplies and equipment; autoclaving of sterile equipment and supplies; assume responsibility for the proper care of all supplies and equipment.
Transport patients, assist with lifting, positioning, and transferring patients; report unusual occurrences and contribute to the efficient and productive operations of the Operating Room.
Partially access medications to transport or stock medications to approved storage locations.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of an accredited school of Surgical Technology. Certified CST. BLS from American Heart Association or Red Cross required. Minimum one year of CVOR scrub experience.
